message: “If my kid goes missing, wouldn’t I want someone putting everything into it?” said Detective Ian Mack, who is with the new Missing Persons Unit." #missing

data.description: Thousands of people are reported missing across the DMV every year, so the Prince William County Police Department is creating a new unit that will specialize in uniting loved ones. “If my kid goes missing, wouldn’t I want someone putting everything into it? ” said Detective Ian Ma...
data.title: Prince William police create Missing Persons Unit to more effectively handle missing cases
